thread.title: Vedalam Updates: Audio Release On October 16th, Teaser Marches Towards 3.5 Million Views
thread.title_full: Vedalam Updates: Audio Release On October 16th, Teaser Marches Towards 3.5 Million Views

title: Vedalam Updates: Audio Release On October 16th, Teaser Marches Towards 3.5 Million Views
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
The much awaited audio release of Thala Ajith 's upcoming film Vedalam will happen on October 16th. Music for the entire album is composed by young musical sensation Anirudh . 
Since Anirudh is celebrating his 25th birthday on October 16th, the team of Vedalam has decided to launch the film's album on that very day as a part of his birthday celebrations. 
"Get ready to dance to the songs of #Vedalam from my birthday :) #VedalamAlbumonOct16 #A10 .. #therikkavidalama", the VIP music director tweeted not very long ago. 
This is the first time Anirudh has composed music for a Ajith starrer and hence this particular album is anticipated with utmost eagerness by fans and music lovers. 
It is said that the film will have 5 songs including the theme music and that each song will be different from the other. Shruti Haasan has reportedly sung one of them and all the songs have been penned by Madhan Karky and Viveka. 
Meanwhile, the recently released teaser is well on its way in accumulating 3.5 Million views. It has already amassed 121,036 likes so far with just 40,856 dislikes.
